headline: 2025 retail roundup: The tug-of-war between narrative & numbers
summary: BMO Capital Markets Managing Director Simeon Siegel discusses his 2026 outlook for retail and athleisure brands, coming off a rocky 2025 defined by discounting promotions and trade tariff impacts. Also watch Simeon Siegel weigh in on Nike's (NKE) latest earnings results. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

content.title: 2025 retail roundup: The tug-of-war between narrative & numbers
